Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder of a light-brown pottery ribbed vessel, the interior is spotted with a brown resinous deposit, exterior covered with a self-slip and remains of two lines of Coptic text written in black ink.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393252) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393252)
